overview: Two men are standing in an office space, appearing to exchange something.
detailed_description: The scene shows two men in an office setting. The man on the left is wearing a black T-shirt, greenish-brown pants, and sneakers. The man on the right is wearing a white T-shirt, black pants, and dark shoes. They are standing near a table with what appears to be a wrapped object in their hands. There is an office chair and another piece of furniture behind them. The office has white walls, a light-colored floor, and there are doors and what seems to be a server room or storage area on the left.

attributes.clothing: white T-shirt, black pants, dark shoes
